0.title: FRANCE, FRANCE REVOLUTION
clues: This structure, a symbol of the Bourbon monarchy, was stormed on July 14, 1789

Germinal, Fructidor & Thermidor could be found on the New French Republican this adopted in 1793

2.title: DO YOU KNOW THE WAY TO SAN JOSE?

11.title: NICKNAMES
